verses.verse: Now <S%H3405>Jericho<s%> was <S%H5462>tightly<s%> <S%H5462>shut<s%> <S%H4480>because<s%> <S%H6440><s%> of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel;<s%> <S%H369>no<s%> <S%H369>one<s%> <S%H3318>went<s%> out and <S%H369>no<s%> <S%H369>one<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> in.

And the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H3091>Joshua,<s%> <S%H7200>"See,<s%> I have <S%H5414>given<s%> <S%H3405>Jericho<s%> into your <S%H3027>hand,<s%> with its <S%H4428>king<s%> [and] the <S%H2428>valiant<s%> <S%H1368>warriors.<s%>

"And you shall <S%H5437>march<s%> <S%H5437>around<s%> the <S%H5892>city,<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H376>men<s%> of <S%H4421>war<s%> <S%H5362>circling<s%> the <S%H5892>city<s%> <S%H259>once.<s%> <S%H6471><s%> You shall <S%H6213>do<s%> <S%H3541>so<s%> for <S%H8337>six<s%> <S%H3117>days.<s%>

"Also <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H3548>priests<s%> shall <S%H5375>carry<s%> <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H7782>trumpets<s%> of rams' <S%H3104>horns<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H727>ark;<s%> then on the <S%H7637>seventh<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> you shall <S%H5437>march<s%> <S%H5437>around<s%> the <S%H5892>city<s%> <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H6471>times,<s%> and the <S%H3548>priests<s%> shall <S%H8628>blow<s%> the <S%H7782>trumpets.<s%>

"And it shall be that when they <S%H4900>make<s%> a <S%H4900>long<s%> <S%H4900>blast<s%> with the ram's <S%H7161>horn,<s%> and when you <S%H8085>hear<s%> the <S%H6963>sound<s%> of the <S%H7782>trumpet,<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> shall <S%H7321>shout<s%> with a <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H8643>shout;<s%> and the <S%H2346>wall<s%> of the <S%H5892>city<s%> will <S%H5307>fall<s%> <S%H5307>down<s%> <S%H8478>flat,<s%> and the <S%H5971>people<s%> will <S%H5927>go<s%> up <S%H376>every<s%> <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H5048>straight<s%> <S%H5048>ahead.<s%>"

So <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5126>Nun<s%> <S%H7121>called<s%> the <S%H3548>priests<s%> and <S%H559>said<s%> to them, <S%H5375>"Take<s%> up the <S%H727>ark<s%> of the <S%H1285>covenant,<s%> and let <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H3548>priests<s%> <S%H5375>carry<s%> <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H7782>trumpets<s%> of rams' <S%H3104>horns<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H727>ark<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord.<s%>"

Then he <S%H559>said<s%> to the <S%H5971>people,<s%> <S%H5674>"Go<s%> <S%H5674>forward,<s%> and <S%H5437>march<s%> <S%H5437>around<s%> the <S%H5892>city,<s%> and let the <S%H9139>armed<s%> men <S%H5674>go<s%> on <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H727>ark<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord.<s%>"

And it was [so,] that when <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> had <S%H559>spoken<s%> to the <S%H5971>people,<s%> the <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H3548>priests<s%> <S%H5375>carrying<s%> the <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H7782>trumpets<s%> of rams' <S%H3104>horns<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H5674>went<s%> <S%H5674>forward<s%> and <S%H8628>blew<s%> the <S%H7782>trumpets;<s%> and the <S%H727>ark<s%> of the <S%H1285>covenant<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H1980>followed<s%> <S%H310><s%> them.

And the <S%H9139>armed<s%> men <S%H1980>went<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3548>priests<s%> who <S%H8628>blew<s%> the <S%H7782>trumpets,<s%> and the <S%H622>rear<s%> <S%H622>guard<s%> <S%H1980>came<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> the <S%H727>ark,<s%> while they <S%H1980>continued<s%> to <S%H8628>blow<s%> the <S%H7782>trumpets.<s%>

But <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> <S%H6680>commanded<s%> the <S%H5971>people,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> "You shall not <S%H7321>shout<s%> <S%H3808>nor<s%> let your <S%H6963>voice<s%> be <S%H8085>heard,<s%> <S%H3808>nor<s%> let a <S%H1697>word<s%> <S%H3318>proceed<s%> out of your <S%H6310>mouth,<s%> <S%H5704>until<s%> the <S%H3117>day<s%> I <S%H559>tell<s%> you, <S%H7321>'Shout!<s%>' Then you shall <S%H7321>shout!<s%>"

So he had the <S%H727>ark<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H5437>taken<s%> <S%H5437>around<s%> the <S%H5892>city,<s%> <S%H5362>circling<s%> [it] <S%H259>once<s%><S%H6471>;<s%> then they <S%H935>came<s%> into the <S%H4264>camp<s%> and <S%H3885>spent<s%> the <S%H3885>night<s%> in the <S%H4264>camp.<s%>
Now <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> <S%H7925>rose<s%> <S%H7925>early<s%> in the <S%H1242>morning,<s%> and the <S%H3548>priests<s%> <S%H5375>took<s%> up the <S%H727>ark<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord.<s%>

And the <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H3548>priests<s%> <S%H5375>carrying<s%> the <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H7782>trumpets<s%> of rams' <S%H3104>horns<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H727>ark<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H1980>went<s%> on <S%H1980>continually,<s%> and <S%H8628>blew<s%> the <S%H7782>trumpets;<s%> and the <S%H9139>armed<s%> men <S%H1980>went<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> them, and the <S%H622>rear<s%> <S%H622>guard<s%> <S%H1980>came<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> the <S%H727>ark<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> while they <S%H1980>continued<s%> to <S%H8628>blow<s%> the <S%H7782>trumpets.<s%>

Thus the <S%H8145>second<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> they <S%H5437>marched<s%> <S%H5437>around<s%> the <S%H5892>city<s%> <S%H259>once<s%> <S%H6471><s%> and <S%H7725>returned<s%> to the <S%H4264>camp;<s%> they <S%H6213>did<s%> <S%H3541>so<s%> for <S%H8337>six<s%> <S%H3117>days.<s%>

Then it <S%H1961>came<s%> about on the <S%H7637>seventh<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> that they <S%H7925>rose<s%> <S%H7925>early<s%> at the <S%H7837>dawning<s%> of the <S%H7837>day<s%> and <S%H5437>marched<s%> <S%H5437>around<s%> the <S%H5892>city<s%> in the <S%H2088>same<s%> <S%H4941>manner<s%> <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H6471>times;<s%> <S%H7534>only<s%> on that <S%H3117>day<s%> they <S%H5437>marched<s%> <S%H5437>around<s%> the <S%H5892>city<s%> <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H6471>times.<s%>

And it <S%H1961>came<s%> about at the <S%H7637>seventh<s%> <S%H6471>time,<s%> when the <S%H3548>priests<s%> <S%H8628>blew<s%> the <S%H7782>trumpets,<s%> <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to the <S%H5971>people,<s%> <S%H7321>"Shout!<s%> For the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> has <S%H5414>given<s%> you the <S%H5892>city.<s%>

"And the <S%H5892>city<s%> shall be <S%H9172>under<s%> the <S%H9172>ban,<s%> it and <S%H3605>all<s%> that is in it belongs to the <S%H3068>Lord;<s%> <S%H7534>only<s%> <S%H7343>Rahab<s%> the <S%H2181>harlot<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H834>who<s%> are with her in the <S%H1004>house<s%> shall <S%H2421>live,<s%> <S%H3588>because<s%> she <S%H2244>hid<s%> the <S%H4397>messengers<s%> <S%H834>whom<s%> we <S%H7971>sent.<s%>

"But as for you, <S%H7534>only<s%> <S%H8104>keep<s%> yourselves from the <S%H9172>things<s%> <S%H9172>under<s%> the <S%H9172>ban,<s%> <S%H6435>lest<s%> you <S%H2763>covet<s%> [them] and <S%H3947>take<s%> <S%H4480>some<s%> of the <S%H9172>things<s%> <S%H9172>under<s%> the <S%H9172>ban,<s%> so you would <S%H7760>make<s%> the <S%H4264>camp<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H9172>accursed<s%> and <S%H5916>bring<s%> <S%H5916>trouble<s%> on it.

"But <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H3701>silver<s%> and <S%H2091>gold<s%> and <S%H3627>articles<s%> of <S%H5178>bronze<s%> and <S%H1270>iron<s%> are <S%H6944>holy<s%> to the <S%H3068>Lord;<s%> they shall <S%H935>go<s%> into the <S%H214>treasury<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord.<s%>"

So the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H7321>shouted,<s%> and [priests] <S%H8628>blew<s%> the <S%H7782>trumpets;<s%> and it <S%H1961>came<s%> about, when the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H8085>heard<s%> the <S%H6963>sound<s%> of the <S%H7782>trumpet,<s%> that the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H7321>shouted<s%> with a <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H8643>shout<s%> and the <S%H2346>wall<s%> <S%H5307>fell<s%> <S%H5307>down<s%> <S%H8478>flat,<s%> so that the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H5927>went<s%> up into the <S%H5892>city,<s%> <S%H376>every<s%> <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H5048>straight<s%> <S%H5048>ahead,<s%> and they <S%H3920>took<s%> the <S%H5892>city.<s%>

And they <S%H2763>utterly<s%> <S%H2763>destroyed<s%> <S%H3605>everything<s%> in the <S%H5892>city,<s%> <S%H4480>both<s%> <S%H5704><s%> <S%H376>man<s%> and <S%H802>woman,<s%> <S%H5288>young<s%> and <S%H2205>old,<s%> and <S%H7794>ox<s%> and <S%H7716>sheep<s%> and <S%H2543>donkey,<s%> with the <S%H6310>edge<s%> of the <S%H2719>sword.<s%>

And <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to the <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H376>men<s%> who had <S%H7270>spied<s%> out the <S%H776>land,<s%> <S%H935>"Go<s%> into the harlot's <S%H1004>house<s%> and <S%H3318>bring<s%> the <S%H802>woman<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> she has out of <S%H8033>there,<s%> as you have <S%H7650>sworn<s%> to her."

So the <S%H5288>young<s%> <S%H5288>men<s%> who were <S%H7270>spies<s%> <S%H935>went<s%> in and <S%H3318>brought<s%> out <S%H7343>Rahab<s%> and her father and her <S%H1>mother<s%> and her <S%H517>brothers<s%> and <S%H251>all<s%> she had; they also <S%H3605>brought<s%> out <S%H3318>all<s%> her <S%H3605>relatives,<s%> and <S%H4940>placed<s%> them <S%H5117>outside<s%> <S%H4480><s%> the <S%H2351>camp<s%> of <S%H4264>Israel.<s%>

And they <S%H8313>burned<s%> the <S%H5892>city<s%> with <S%H784>fire,<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> that was in it. <S%H7534>Only<s%> the <S%H3701>silver<s%> and <S%H2091>gold<s%> and <S%H3627>articles<s%> of <S%H5178>bronze<s%> and <S%H1270>iron,<s%> they <S%H5414>put<s%> into the <S%H214>treasury<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord.<s%>

However, <S%H7343>Rahab<s%> the <S%H2181>harlot<s%> and her father's <S%H1004>household<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> she had, <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> <S%H2421>spared;<s%> and she has <S%H3427>lived<s%> in the <S%H7130>midst<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> to <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H3117>day,<s%> for she <S%H2244>hid<s%> the <S%H4397>messengers<s%> <S%H834>whom<s%> <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> <S%H7971>sent<s%> to <S%H7270>spy<s%> out <S%H3405>Jericho.<s%>

Then <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> made them <S%H7650>take<s%> an <S%H7650>oath<s%> at that <S%H6256>time,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H779>"Cursed<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> is the <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H834>who<s%> <S%H6965>rises<s%> up and <S%H1129>builds<s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H5892>city<s%> <S%H3405>Jericho;<s%> with [the loss of] his first-born he shall <S%H3245>lay<s%> its <S%H3245>foundation,<s%> and with [the loss of] his <S%H6810>youngest<s%> <S%H6810>son<s%> he shall <S%H5324>set<s%> up its <S%H1817>gates.<s%>"
So the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> was with <S%H3091>Joshua,<s%> and his <S%H8089>fame<s%> was in <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H776>land.<s%>
